title: Phoenix

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Scorch someone and come back from the dead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you die, you turn to ashes.
- After the next phase, come back from the ashes. You can not be killed/voted the phase you come back.
- If the game would end before you revive, you do not revive.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 479
*Back from the ashes to turn others to ashes.*
